levelName: 英文單字認讀基礎級(一)

examples.english: I often help my mom do chores at home.
examples.chinese: 我常常幫我媽媽在家裡做家事。

examples.english: I am a third-grade student at this elementary school.
examples.chinese: 我是這間小學三年級的學生。

examples.english: I want to read a fun storybook before bedtime.
examples.chinese: 我想在睡覺前讀一本有趣的故事書。

examples.english: You are a kind student in my class.
examples.chinese: 你是我班上一個很和善的學生。

examples.english: You all can play together after school.
examples.chinese: 你們放學後可以一起玩。

examples.english: Do you like to eat fruit for breakfast?
examples.chinese: 你早餐喜歡吃水果嗎？

examples.english: He is a happy boy and he likes to draw pictures.
examples.chinese: 他是個快樂的男孩，他喜歡畫圖。

examples.english: Every day, he goes to school by bus.
examples.chinese: 他每天都搭公車去學校。

examples.english: He has a red hat and wears it often.
examples.chinese: 他有一頂紅色的帽子，而且他常常戴著它。

examples.english: She is a kind girl with long hair.
examples.chinese: 她是一個有著長頭髮的親切女孩。

examples.english: She likes to read storybooks at night.
examples.chinese: 她喜歡在晚上讀故事書。

examples.english: She plays soccer with her brother on weekends.
examples.chinese: 她在週末和她的哥哥踢足球。

examples.english: My dog is small. It likes to play with a ball.
examples.chinese: 我的狗狗很小。牠喜歡玩球。

examples.english: It is seven o'clock now. Time for school!
examples.chinese: 現在七點了。該上學了！

examples.english: It is important to brush your teeth every day.
examples.chinese: 每天刷牙很重要。

examples.english: We like to draw pictures with our friends.
examples.chinese: 我們喜歡和我們的朋友一起畫畫。

examples.english: We are happy to be in the same class.
examples.chinese: 我們很高興在同一個班級。

examples.english: We have a lot of fun together every day.
examples.chinese: 我們每天都玩得很開心。

examples.english: The children like to play outside. They are very happy.
examples.chinese: 孩子們喜歡在外面玩。他們非常開心。

examples.english: My friends read many books. They learn new things every day.
examples.chinese: 我的朋友們讀很多書。他們每天學習新事物。

examples.english: The birds sing in the trees. They fly high in the sky.
examples.chinese: 鳥兒在樹上唱歌。牠們在天空中飛得很高。

examples.english: The boy plays with his red ball.
examples.chinese: 這個男孩玩他的紅色球。

examples.english: That boy helps his friend clean the desk.
examples.chinese: 那個男孩幫他的朋友清理桌子。

examples.english: Every boy in the class likes to sing a song.
examples.chinese: 班上的每個男孩都喜歡唱歌。

examples.english: That happy girl has a big red ball.
examples.chinese: 那個開心的女孩有一個大的紅球。

examples.english: A girl likes to play with dolls.
examples.chinese: 女孩喜歡玩洋娃娃。

examples.english: The girl goes to school every day.
examples.chinese: 這個女孩每天上學。

examples.english: My little baby loves to play with toys.
examples.chinese: 我的小嬰兒喜歡玩玩具。

examples.english: This baby has big, cute eyes.
examples.chinese: 這個嬰兒有又大又可愛的眼睛。

examples.english: The baby bird is learning to fly now.
examples.chinese: 這隻小鳥寶寶現在正在學飛。

examples.english: I see a big red car on the road.
examples.chinese: 我在路上看到一輛大紅色的車子。

examples.english: This is a cute brown dog playing in the park.
examples.chinese: 這是一隻在公園裡玩耍的可愛棕色狗。

examples.english: My father is a kind doctor at the hospital.
examples.chinese: 我的爸爸是醫院裡一位和藹的醫生。

examples.english: The blue bird sings a beautiful song.
examples.chinese: 這隻藍色小鳥唱著一首美妙的歌。

examples.english: The teacher reads a story to the class.
examples.chinese: 那位老師對班上同學讀一個故事。

examples.english: Let's go to the park and play games.
examples.chinese: 我們去那個公園玩遊戲吧。

examples.english: This is my new book, and it is very interesting.
examples.chinese: 這是我新的書，而且它很有趣。

examples.english: This red apple is very sweet, I like it a lot.
examples.chinese: 這個紅色的蘋果很甜，我很喜歡它。

examples.english: This is a nice day today, let's go outside.
examples.chinese: 這是一個美好的日子，我們出去玩吧。

examples.english: Here are 3 example sentences with Chinese translations for "that" (那):
That red apple on the table looks so delicious.
examples.chinese: 桌上那個紅蘋果看起來真好吃。

examples.english: That boy running in the park is my classmate, Tom.
examples.chinese: 公園裡跑步的那個男孩是我的同學Tom。

examples.english: I like that story about the brave little bird very much.
examples.chinese: 我很喜歡那個關於勇敢小鳥的故事。

examples.english: These are my new storybooks.
examples.chinese: 這些是我的新故事書。

examples.english: These apples are sweet and red.
examples.chinese: 這些蘋果又甜又紅。

examples.english: These students are reading quietly in the library.
examples.chinese: 這些學生在圖書館裡安靜地閱讀。

examples.english: Those flowers in the garden smell wonderful.
examples.chinese: 那些在花園裡的花聞起來很香。

examples.english: Those students are reading books in the library.
examples.chinese: 那些學生正在圖書館裡讀書。

examples.english: Those shoes are too big for my feet.
examples.chinese: 那些鞋子對我的腳來說太大了。

examples.english: My favorite color is blue.
examples.chinese: 我最喜歡的顏色是藍色。

examples.english: The little bird is on the tree.
examples.chinese: 小鳥在樹上。

examples.english: The baby is now a happy child.
examples.chinese: 這個寶寶現在是一個快樂的小孩。

examples.english: My classmates are all very friendly students.
examples.chinese: 我的同學都是非常友善的學生。

examples.english: We are very happy to play together now.
examples.chinese: 我們現在很高興能一起玩。

examples.english: They are watching a fun cartoon on TV.
examples.chinese: 他們正在電視上看一部有趣的卡通。

examples.english: Hello, I am a student in Grade 3.
examples.chinese: 嗨，我是三年級的學生。

examples.english: After playing games, I am very tired now.
examples.chinese: 玩了遊戲後，我現在很累。

examples.english: I am nine years old this year.
examples.chinese: 我今年九歲。

examples.english: We do our homework together in the afternoon.
examples.chinese: 我們下午一起做功課。

examples.english: Do you like to eat pizza for lunch?
examples.chinese: 你午餐喜歡吃披薩嗎？

examples.english: My friends and I do not play games in class.
examples.chinese: 我和我的朋友們不在課堂上玩遊戲。

examples.english: I do my homework every evening.
examples.chinese: 我每天晚上做功課。

examples.english: Do you like to read books?
examples.chinese: 你喜歡看書嗎？

examples.english: We do not play games in class.
examples.chinese: 我們上課時不做遊戲。

examples.english: My father loves to play with me every day.
examples.chinese: 我的爸爸每天都喜歡和我玩。

examples.english: My father reads a story book every night.
examples.chinese: 我的爸爸每天晚上都會讀故事書。

examples.english: Father teaches me how to ride my bike.
examples.chinese: 爸爸教我怎麼騎我的腳踏車。

examples.english: My mother loves me and takes care of me every day.
examples.chinese: 我的媽媽愛我，每天都照顧我。

examples.english: My mother cooks delicious dinner for our family every night.
examples.chinese: 我的媽媽每天晚上為我們家煮好吃的晚餐。

examples.english: The mother cat takes good care of her little kittens.
examples.chinese: 那隻貓媽媽好好地照顧牠的小貓咪。

examples.english: My son likes to play soccer very much.
examples.chinese: 我的兒子非常喜歡踢足球。

examples.english: Mr. Wang's son is a very smart student.
examples.chinese: 王先生的兒子是一位非常聰明的學生。

examples.english: Their son loves to read story books.
examples.chinese: 他們的兒子很喜歡看故事書。

examples.english: This is my daughter. She loves to read books.
examples.chinese: 這是我的女兒。她喜歡讀書。

examples.english: My daughter likes to play with her friends.
examples.chinese: 我的女兒喜歡和她的朋友玩。

examples.english: My little daughter is seven years old now.
examples.chinese: 我的小女兒現在七歲了。

examples.english: My grandmother loves to tell me stories.
examples.chinese: 我的祖母喜歡說故事給我聽。

examples.english: Grandmothers often give warm hugs to children.
examples.chinese: 祖母們常常給孩子們溫暖的擁抱。

examples.english: We visit our grandmother's house every Sunday.
examples.chinese: 我們每個星期天都會去祖母家。

examples.english: My grandfather loves to read books to me.
examples.chinese: 我的祖父喜歡讀書給我聽。

examples.english: I often go to the park with my grandfather.
examples.chinese: 我常和我的祖父去公園。

examples.english: My grandfather teaches me many new things.
examples.chinese: 我的祖父教我許多新事物。

examples.english: My older brother is very kind. He helps me study.
examples.chinese: 我的哥哥很善良。他幫我學習。

examples.english: My little brother likes to play with toy cars all day.
examples.chinese: 我的弟弟整天喜歡玩玩具車。

examples.english: My brother and I ride our bikes to the park on weekends.
examples.chinese: 我和我的兄弟週末騎腳踏車去公園。

examples.english: I have a sister, and we play together every day.
examples.chinese: 我有一個姐妹，我們每天都一起玩。

examples.english: My older sister helps me to clean my room.
examples.chinese: 我的姊姊幫我打掃房間。

examples.english: My little sister likes to draw colorful pictures.
examples.chinese: 我的妹妹喜歡畫彩色圖畫。

examples.english: I have zero apples in my bag today.
examples.chinese: 我今天書包裡有零顆蘋果。

examples.english: The temperature is zero degrees Celsius outside.
examples.chinese: 外面氣溫是零度。

examples.english: Our team has zero points right now.
examples.chinese: 我們隊伍現在有零分。

examples.english: I have one red apple in my bag.
examples.chinese: 我的包包裡有一個紅蘋果。

examples.english: I want the blue shirt. Do you want the red one?
examples.chinese: 我想要藍色的襯衫。你想要紅色的那一件嗎？

examples.english: There is only one dog in the park.
examples.chinese: 公園裡只有一隻狗。

examples.english: I have two red apples in my bag.
examples.chinese: 我的包包裡有兩個紅蘋果。

examples.english: It is two o'clock now, time for lunch!
examples.chinese: 現在是兩點鐘，該吃午餐了！

examples.english: My two friends like to read books together.
examples.chinese: 我的兩個朋友喜歡一起看書。

examples.english: I have three red pencils in my pencil case.
examples.chinese: 我鉛筆盒裡有三枝紅色鉛筆。

examples.english: We go home from school at three o'clock every day.
examples.chinese: 我們每天三點鐘從學校回家。

examples.english: My little brother has three toy cars to play with.
examples.chinese: 我弟弟有三輛玩具車可以玩。
